article.title: How We Respond to Illegal Immigration

title_result: HEARING OF THE IMMIGRATION, BORDER SECURITY, AND CLAIMS SUBCOMMITTEE OF THE HOUSE JUDICIARY COMMITTEE SUBJECT: SHOULD WE EMBRACE THE SENATE'S GRANT OF AMNESTY TO MILLIONS OF ILLEGAL ALIENS AND REPEAT THE MISTAKES OF THE IMMIGRATION REFORM AND CONTROL ACT OF 1986? CHAIRED BY: REPRESENTATIVE JOHN NATHAN HOSTETTLER (R-IN) WITNESSES: REPRESENTATIVE SILVESTRE REYES (D-TX); PHYLLIS SCHLAFLEY, PRESIDENT, EAGLE FORUM; STEVEN CAMAROTA, DIRECTOR OF RESEARCH, CENTER FOR IMMIGRATION STUDIES; JAMES R. EDWARDS JR., ADJUNCT FELLOW, HUDSON INSTITUTE LOCATION: 2141 RAYBURN HOUSE OFFICE BUILDING, WASHINGTON, D.C.
